title: Obstacle remove when offscreen and reappear when below the screen

cells.data:
Wednesday, July 5, 2017 5:45pm
After considerable troubleshooting, have finally gotten this part of the code to work.
Still have not implemented the code to do the same thing when object are above the screen.
this should not be too difficult as the same concept applies.

Have had to keep extending the dealine on this one. It was a fairly complex problem.
